name: C. AquaMoon and Strange Sort
statement:
AquaMoon has n friends. They stand in a row from left to right, and the
i-th friend from the left wears a T-shirt with a number a_i written on
it. Each friend has a direction (left or right). In the beginning, the
direction of each friend is .AquaMoon can make some operations on
friends. On each operation, AquaMoon can choose two friends and swap
their positions. After each operation, the direction of both chosen
friends will also be flipped: left to right and vice versa.AquaMoon
hopes that after some operations, the numbers written on the T-shirt of
n friends in the row, read from left to right, become . Also she wants,
that all friends will have a direction of at the end. Please find if it
is possible.
